# Literature

Here is a review of existing methods.

```{marginfigure}
We know from _the first fundamental theorem of calculus_ that
for $x$ in $[a, b]$:
$$\frac{d}{dx}\left( \int_{a}^{x} f(u)\,du\right)=f(x).$$
```
